name: EvolveUs
description:
Prototype/Alpha: Simple combat based match 3. Play a slime as it fights through the forest. Every battle makes you strong and allows you to battle new foes. If you fight enough some enemies, might evolve.

Todo (things that need to happen soon)

  • Link Monsters, so they evolve in order and not into a random monster
  • Make sure the game saves right
  • Remove treasure chests for now
  • Fix the way locked tiles work
  • Add sun/moon difficulty modifier
Future Features I want
  • Inventory System to add buffs and heal
  • Expanded worlds
  • New art for other parts of the world
